title: My Girl Is Wild And Free
itunes:title: My Girl Is Wild And Free
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 31 year old man and I met a really dope woman at a house party. She’s 30 years old, no kids, with a good job and her own house. I started vibing with her at the party so I asked her out. Two days later, she picked me up for our date and she asked to use my bathroom. She left the bathroom door open and told me to come in. She sat on the counter, whispered a few words in my ear and I almost lost my mind. After a few rounds of amazing sex, we sat up talking until 5am..............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
